wikipedia_page.main: Bethan Forrow (born 4 May 2001) is a British slalom canoeist who has competed at the international level since 2016.She won a gold medal in the C1 team event at the 2018 ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships in Rio de Janeiro as well as a gold medal in the same event at the 2018 European Championships in Prague.
